name: late-fusion-empenn
description: A submission for the MS-Multi-Spine challenge, using late fusion to combine predictions from multiple MRI sequences.
author: Ricky Walsh
command-line: home=$(pwd); unzip [INPUT_ARCHIVE] -d /app/inference/input ; cd /app/inference; mkdir -p OUTDIR; bash run_inference.sh input/* OUTDIR; rm -rf OUTDIR/tmp && tar -cvzf ${home}/[OUTPUT_FILE] OUTDIR

inputs.name: Input archive
inputs.description: Input archive containing all files available for one patient

output-files.description: Tarball containing results. Results are expected under the form of a .nii and a .csv file, both written in the OUTDIR
output-files.name: Output archive
